Create extra variables in the count table

Source: R/handlers.R
mutate_counts.Rd

Create extra variables in the count table

Usage

mutate_counts(ta, ...)

Arguments

ta

A tidytacos object.

...

Mutate criteria for the counts table.

Value

A tidytacos object.

Examples

# add a column to the counts table
urt %>% mutate_counts(cl10 = log10(count))
#> $samples
